name: Titikopatitza
description:
Titikopatitza is a video game adventure designed to test the sonic design technics that can be used to combine an immersive experience with a learning module. 

As a modern solo explorer, travelling the Yucatan Peninsula jungle, you discover an ancient Maya city. 

All materials is inspired by historical elements, the aim was to create a simple artistic and educational piece by the way of teaching a part of the Mayan culture.

A design documentation focused on the audio development is accessible here: https://arthurcddesigner.webflow.io/blog-posts/workflow-development-titikopatitz...
